job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Purple is a digitally-native vertical brand with a mission to help people feel and live better through innovative comfort solutions. To us, comfort means more than great products, it means empowering every employee to feel comfortable being themselves. We believe your career at Purple will be a one-of-a-kind “Career in Comfort” because our workforce is one-of-a-kind. We are committed to a culture of collaboration where every voice is heard and understood. As an innovation company at our core, we believe a diversity workforce brings better insights, solutions and products and serves as the backbone to bettering our company. Join with us as we add to our team of exceptional individuals who will help us take over the world — one mattress at a time.
Job SummaryWHO WE ARE
We are the Purple Innovations Team. We are a fast-growing group of technical experts, product innovators, and creative problem solvers. Our mission is simple; drive measurable business value by iterating designs, testing hypothesis, and delivering complete product definition to deliver compelling and truly innovative products that create Purple customers for life.
Who You Are
We are looking for an experienced software engineer who is organized in thought and process and well experienced in electronics IoT products. In this role, you will design applications that run on AWS backend for Purple products, as well as additional custom software applications to support Purple products. You will be working closely with embedded electronics engineers. You will work on multiple projects in parallel.
Job Description
Responsibilities
Implement software solutions for innovative new products
Implement algorithms for advanced computing
Design documentation to support testing and production
Practice good revision control process
Work within a diverse design team to achieve business objectives
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineerin g
3 + years of demonstrated success in software design and support for high-volume consumer products
Experience working on AWS backend systems to support IoT devices
Proficient in Object Oriented Programming, Java, C/C++ , C# , SQL
Experience deploying software using CI/CD tools
Experience designing RESTful APIs
Design experience with Linux-based connected devices
Familiar with iOS and Android app development and testing tools (like Selenium)
Ex perience implementing Machine Learning algorithms using AWS SageMaker
Familiar wi th embedded applications on Linux systems ( Yocto )
A creative problem solver who isn’t afraid of failure
The candidate must demonstrate strong ownership, personal initiative, and accountability while embracing a collaborative approach
Highly proficient with Microsoft Windows and Office Suite applications
Experience working with project management in an Agile Scrum based product development process helpful
Passion for making great products through research and development and for sharing their knowledge and findings with others
Benefits And Perks
Medical, Dental, Vision
401(k) Match
Generous PTO
Market Money
Earn a Mattress
Purple Swag
Amazing Purple Products
WHY WORK AT PURPLE?
Make your mark: We value innovative thinking. At Purple, you will be empowered to bring your ideas to life as we work together to improve people’s lives through comfort.
Gain unique experience: Be a part of one of the fastest growing companies in Utah! The contributions you make will matter at Purple as the company continues to grow with you.
Awesome culture: Join the tight-knit team at Purple and you can enjoy working alongside industry experts, making close friends, and annual employee appreciation events.
Purple provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.
This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment.
